transcript: usually 0 to3 million is is product Market fit so the whole objective of that phase in the business is just do people want to buy what you are selling the mistake that most people make is they think okay I should Market more and that's usually not the case usually now it's like okay we've proven product Market fit but we are not getting any referrals we're not getting a lot of word of mouth and unless we clean up all the back end and increase customer lifetime value put all the infrastructure in place so that we can get more ascensions build a back all the other things that are required to really create an exceptional customer experience and usually just by cleaning up the back and without even increasing the Sal velocity or number of units sold per month we can still triple the business
